SELECT e.enrl_id, e.enrl_dt, p.prod_nm FROM tb_prodmst p JOIN tb_prd_enrl e ON p.prod_cd = e.prod_cd JOIN tb_custmst c ON e.cust_mbl_telno = c.cust_mbl_telno WHERE c.cust_nm = #{customer}
